post.title: Fuck your preferrential treatment admins

body: They originally did want a free speech site. But then discord came along and they got distanced from the rest of their userbase, as I predicted because DefaultMods had the exact same outcome.
body_html: They originally did want a free speech site. But then discord came along and they got distanced from the rest of their userbase, as I predicted because DefaultMods had the exact same outcome.

parent.body: That’s really odd. Why did they make this site then? Free speech is about tolerating and being around other ideas. And it’s what necessarily for running a site with many different users. And I have noticed they don’t interact with users on Ruqqus much anymore. Maybe they would have more fun if they engaged with the guilds here. In any case it’s quite a radical transformation from who the admins used to be.
parent.body_html: That’s really odd. Why did they make this site then? Free speech is about tolerating and being around other ideas. And it’s what necessarily for running a site with many different users. And I have noticed they don’t interact with users on Ruqqus much anymore. Maybe they would have more fun if they engaged with the guilds here. In any case it’s quite a radical transformation from who the admins used to be.

post.body:
In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of **MANY** available free speech chat platforms).

They have [personally taken part](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5emh/alleged-shill-activity-coordination-on-discord/ipl7) in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as ["trolling"](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5s60/the-difference-between-trolls-and-shills/k0vo), and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.  

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were [exiled from official admin guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/61dg/strange-behaviour-by-cap) (the **ONLY** official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those [politely requesting a reason](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/64sd/captainmeta4-doesnt-like-being-called-out) for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

#### Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:  
 
 * Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

 * Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

 * Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

#### Users  

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

#### Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh6s/oYMVEWoGfyI) 

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh6y/7Os56srgrQ4)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh74/C-Ov9cZFMQY)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh7c/VNXj2Mla5UA)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh7g/8C1f_XmDYf8)
post.body_html:
In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of MANY available free speech chat platforms).

They have personally taken part in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as "trolling", and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were exiled from official admin guilds (the ONLY official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those politely requesting a reason for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:

  • Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

  • Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

  • Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

Users

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were [exiled from official admin guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/61dg/strange-behaviour-by-cap) (the **ONLY** official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those [politely requesting a reason](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/64sd/captainmeta4-doesnt-like-being-called-out) for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

#### Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:  
 
 * Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

 * Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

 * Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

#### Users  

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

#### Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh6s/oYMVEWoGfyI) 

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh6y/7Os56srgrQ4)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh74/C-Ov9cZFMQY)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh7c/VNXj2Mla5UA)

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/lh7g/8C1f_XmDYf8)
post.body_html:
In the past months, the admins have demonstrated their growing disconnect with the community.

They have made Big Tech, anti-free speech platforms (Discord) their main method of communication, using the draconian rules on those platforms as an excuse to ban those they disagree with (rather than switch to one of MANY available free speech chat platforms).

They have personally taken part in clear agenda-driven shill campaigns, very thinly veiled as "trolling", and have burred their heads in the sand when presented very clear evidence, supported by the majority of their userbase - especially when the "trolling" continued even after said campaign was officially over.

They have decided to isolate themselves on Discord, listening to a tiny vocal minority.

They have shown clear bias in regards to rule enforcement, doing nothing to their new discord buddies for countless harassment against users such as @milkit, but banning the plebs like @Acerphoon for telling one of the prominent RCP members (@no_chill) to kill himself (something the RCP cabal members have been doing countless times, with no consequences).

When users criticized and disagreed with site changes that were proposed by said vocal minority, they were exiled from official admin guilds (the ONLY official communication channels apart from Discord), and even those politely requesting a reason for such exiles were themselves exiled, for exposing the admin hypocrisy.

So, since the admins clearly do not want to listen to constructive, polite criticism, it's time we told them exactly what we think about them...

Guildmasters

As a guildmaster, if you want to participate in this protest, do the following, in each of your guilds:

  • Create a post titled "Fuck captainfaggot and kuk", or a similar variation.

  • Link it to the main post, found on +FragileRuqqusAdmin

  • Optionally, use one of the many images which can be found in the above guild.

Users

Post and upvote "Admins can't sneed", and any of the above images, in admin controlled guilds (such as +Ruqqus, +changelog, etc).

Gather on +FragileRuqqusAdmin, and lets let the cucks know exactly how the majority of their community feels about their recent behavior
post.title: Operation Can't Sneed (Fuck You Admins)

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

post.body:
This would be an extraordinarily useful feature. There's currently some weird brigade of users flooding the site with complaints about censorship, while providing no concrete examples, essentially achieving de facto censorship of content via spam.

Is there a way of adding users to a "block list" so that you don't see any of their posts or comments? It would help immensely. I am pretty sure the project codebase is open source and I have some intermediate dev chops, so I'd be happy to help implement this feature if there's any interest.

Who approves updates to the code base? It doesn't help that the founders are all anonymous (as far as I can tell).

Edit: Thank you for everyone who helped, it has made the site great again and works exactly as I was hoping. Discord spam BTFO eternally
post.body_html:
This would be an extraordinarily useful feature. There's currently some weird brigade of users flooding the site with complaints about censorship, while providing no concrete examples, essentially achieving de facto censorship of content via spam.

Is there a way of adding users to a "block list" so that you don't see any of their posts or comments? It would help immensely. I am pretty sure the project codebase is open source and I have some intermediate dev chops, so I'd be happy to help implement this feature if there's any interest.

Who approves updates to the code base? It doesn't help that the founders are all anonymous (as far as I can tell).

Edit: Thank you for everyone who helped, it has made the site great again and works exactly as I was hoping. Discord spam BTFO eternally

parent.body:
Well, no. I mean, I also have no life and spend way too much time on Ruqqus, so that's how I sometimes am able to find posts early on. I usually only go on those other sites (the ones other than reddit and ruqqus) if I know some important-ish event is going on (such as when Voat was about to shut down or when SaidIt was about to ban /s/Ice_Poseidon2). I also sometimes check them at arbitrary times.

I don't have any "strategy" to being in the right place at the right time.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

body_html: This comes right after they deleted the original secret mod chat channel because Meg leaked something stupid from it and they panicked. And now that their abuses in discord have come into focus, and people are finally catching on to what I've been trying to warn them about, they now deleted everything.

post.body:
Go on it yourself, they're all gone. I noticed when I was in lounge and everything stopped loading. I refreshed and all the channels were gone.

I heard from multiple users that they'd randomly been kicked too.

Edit: False alarm, you have to type `?rank member` again and it apparently undid it for me somehow. But that's still really weird, and convenient timing too. Also the mod channel deletion and the deletion of many old channels really did happen (so I thought it happened again).

Edit 2: I was right to be suspicious of the timing. They did this because too many people were "raiding", meaning expressing dissenting opinions such as this:

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/730807967707824259/792845754283720745/unknown.png)

parent.body:
I adjusted Discord permissions so that you had to type `?rank member` to acknowledge rules, in order to see all the discussion channels. I did this because it was confusing to new members, who didn't know why they could see chat but not say anything. This change shunts new users straight into the rules channel, so they have a better idea what to do.

@crystalvulpine didn't have the `member` role at the time, and instead of, you know, DMing me to ask what was up and why can't he see the chat channels, made this post instead.
parent.body_html:
I adjusted Discord permissions so that you had to type ?rank member to acknowledge rules, in order to see all the discussion channels. I did this because it was confusing to new members, who didn't know why they could see chat but not say anything. This change shunts new users straight into the rules channel, so they have a better idea what to do.

@CrystalVulpine didn't have the member role at the time, and instead of, you know, DMing me to ask what was up and why can't he see the chat channels, made this post instead.

Go on it yourself, they're all gone. I noticed when I was in lounge and everything stopped loading. I refreshed and all the channels were gone.

I heard from multiple users that they'd randomly been kicked too.

Edit: False alarm, you have to type ?rank member again and it apparently undid it for me somehow. But that's still really weird, and convenient timing too. Also the mod channel deletion and the deletion of many old channels really did happen (so I thought it happened again).

Edit 2: I was right to be suspicious of the timing. They did this because too many people were "raiding", meaning expressing dissenting opinions such as this:
post.title: The admins just deleted nearly every channel in the discord to cover up their abuses

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: I just know that cap panicked and deleted the mod channel yesterday and has mass-deleted channels multiple times before to cover up his shenanigans. I don't even know if there's a single original channel left on the server that non-mods can see other than stuff like #welcome.
body_html: I just know that cap panicked and deleted the mod channel yesterday and has mass-deleted channels multiple times before to cover up his shenanigans. I don't even know if there's a single original channel left on the server that non-mods can see other than stuff like #welcome.

parent.body:
Captain has been tweaking the permissions to fix problems for some users, this is normal.

You need to relax, being on edge all the time isn't doing yourself any good.
